description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called BoardWidget that displays a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe game board. It manages layout, highlighting winning lines, and handles cell tap events.
external_methods: BoardTile (constructor and methods, assumed to be imported)

classes.name: BoardWidget
classes.description: An immutable widget that displays a Tic Tac Toe board, highlighting winning lines and handling user interaction.

methods.name: _isHighlighted
methods.description: Determines whether a given cell index is part of the winning line, if any.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for rendering the game board layout with responsive spacing.
